MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL53 and LL54 postcode areas of Pwllheli and Caernarfon, affecting properties in Llanaelhaearn, Pencaenewydd and surrounding areas. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the repairs required to a grounded overhead line and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:53PM on 6th April 2021.
